import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FaAngleLeft, FaAngleRight } from "react-icons/fa"; import importIcon from "../../assest/import.png"; // Styles import "./popUpStyles/payment.css"; function PaymentComponent() { const [page, setPage] = useState(1); const [inputChecker, setInputChecker] = useState({ address: false, phone: false, email: false, name: false, type: false, date: false, time: false, }); const [formValues, setFormValues] = useState({ address: "", phone: "", email: "", name: "", type: "", date: "", time: "", }); function inputChecking() { formValues.address ? setInputChecker({ address: true }) : formValues.phone ? setInputChecker({ phone: true }) : formValues.email ? setInputChecker({ email: true }) : formValues.type ? setInputChecker({ type: true }) : formValues.date ? setInputChecker({ date: true }) : formValues.time ? setInputChecker({ time: true }) : setInputChecker({ time: false }); } function confirmBtn() { console.log("confirmed"); } const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setFormValues({ ...formValues, [name]: value, }); }; function backBtn() { setPage(() => { if (page === 1) { return 1; } return page - 1; }); } function nextBtn() { setPage(page + 1); } function progressBtn() { return ( <>
